title: I don't use Jarvin and i only have 3 refund tokens... is he worth selling for 4800 IP
body: As it says in the title i am wondering if i should sell Jarvin{{champion:59}} and finally get the money for Ekko or Yasuo. Is it worth selling, and which of the two should i get should I sell Jarvin.

replies.body:
You wrote his name three times and misspelt it three times... Not that hard lol.

And no, for the love of god, don't buy Yasuo.
Another OCE Yasuo main in the making hahaha, Joining 80% of OCE players
Please don't mention that phrase OCE Ya**o main, it gives me nightmares.
Nah don't bother refunding just keep playing and earn more ip.
Sorry about that but who would you recommend I buy?
Give me like a few champions you're thinking of and I'll tell you who's pretty good right now
Out of Ekko and Yasuo- i would go with ekko, he's great fun, has versatile builds( ap, tank, can be built bruiser or ad) can go mid,jungle,top, even support if you really want

don't refund champions you bought with IP. Believe me. Its a SUPER waste of a refund token.

You don't get refund tokens back so its REALLY important to use them wisely. I'd keep J4.

It only takes like 65 games to get enough IP for a 6300 champion.
It's worth if you plan on never using RP tho
I had that idea... then I got rp lol
